channel.title: National Biodiesel Conference Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: A series of podcasts from and about the National Biodiesel Conference
channel.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
channel.itunes:summary: The National Biodiesel Conference Podcast features interviews and presentations from every conference since 2006.

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 72 - Florida Biodiesel Users
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: NASA Uses Biodiesel
item.itunes:summary: Bruce Chesson with NASA Transportation picked up the Pioneer Award for his agency and talked about how they use biodiesel during a press conference.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, nasa

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 71 - Florida Biodiesel Users
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Florida Power and Light
item.itunes:summary: Director of Florida Power and Light's Fleet Services George Survant talked about his company's use of biodiesel during a press conference.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, florida power and light

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 70 - New Feedstocks
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: General Session Discussion on New Feedstocks
item.itunes:summary: The closing general session of the 2008 National Biodiesel Conference featured a panel discussion on new feedstocks for biofuels.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, new biofuels feedstocks

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 69 - Biodiesel Energy Balance
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Jon Van Gerpen
item.itunes:summary: Interview with University of Idaho Department Head of Biological and Agricultural Engineering Jon Van Gerpen about new energy balance study.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, energy balance, university of idaho

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 68 - Food Versus Fuel
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with John Urbanchuk
item.itunes:summary: John Urbanchuk of LECG was one of the panelists for the session on food versus fuel at the 2008 biodiesel conference.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, food versus fuel, urbanchuk

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 67 - Food Versus Fuel
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Jim Duffield
item.itunes:summary: Jim Duffield of USDA was one of the panelists for the session on food versus fuel at the 2008 biodiesel conference.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, food versus fuel, usda

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 66 - Emily Landsburg
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Emily Bockian Landsburg
item.itunes:summary: Emily Bockian Landsburg of Philadelphia FryoDiesel is the new chair of the Sustainability Task Force for the NBB.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, emily bockian landsburg, philadelphia fryodiesel, sustainability task force

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 65 - Jim Lovell
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Astronaut Jim Lovell addresses general session
item.itunes:summary: Astronaut Jim Lovell inspired the biodiesel industry at Tuesday morning's general session.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, jim lovell, apollo 13, astronaut

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 64 - Jim Lovell
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Astronaut Jim Lovell addresses general session
item.itunes:summary: Astronaut Jim Lovell spoke to a captivated audience of biodiesel industry folks at the Tuesday morning general session telling them to expect the unexpected.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, jim lovell, apollo 13, astronaut

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 63 - Super Tuesday
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: NBB leaders talk politics at Super Tuesday general session
item.itunes:summary: Lisa Ryan with the NBB's political action committee talks about being successful in DC.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, super tuesday

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 62 - Super Tuesday
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: NBB leaders talk politics at Super Tuesday general session
item.itunes:summary: Manning Ferachi, the NBB's director of governmental affairs, discusses the renewal of the federal tax incentive that keeps biodiesel competitive with petroleum, the CCC Bioenergy program, and the new Renewable Fuels Standard for biodiesel.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, super tuesday

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 61 - Super Tuesday
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: NBB leaders talk politics at Super Tuesday general session
item.itunes:summary: Gene Gebolys, the chairman of the NBB's Regulatory Committee reminded the audience how important the day is to the future of the biodiesel industry.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, super tuesday

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 60 - Teresa Alleman
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Teresa Alleman of NREL
item.itunes:summary: Senior chemist Teresa Alleman talks about a new study from the National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL) which shows the quality of biodiesel has made significant gains.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, national renewable energy laboratory, biodiesel quality

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 59 - David Winslow
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: David Winslow of Universal Studios at press conference
item.itunes:summary: David Winslow of Universal Studios announces that they will increase the amount of biodiesel used at the popular Orlando theme park.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, universal studios, david winslow

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 58 - Peterson Song
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Michael Peterson sings for National Biodiesel Conference
item.itunes:summary: Country singer Michael Peterson entertains the 2008 National Biodiesel Conference general session with "From the Grave to the Cradle".
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, michael peterson, grave to cradle

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 57 - Gary Haer
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with NBB Vice Chair Gary Haer
item.itunes:summary: National Biodiesel Board Vice Chairman Gary Haer of REG talks about the 2008 National Biodiesel Conference, challenges and opportunities for the industry.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, gary haer, REG

item.title: NBB-08 Podcast 56 - Mick Starcevich

item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Dr. Mick Starcevich of Kirkwood Community College
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Mick Starcevich, president of Kirkwood Community College in Iowa, discusses announcement of new program to ramp up biofuels job training and share Iowa's industry expertise.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, mick starcevich, kirkwood community college, iowa, biofuels training, green collar jobs

item.itunes:summary: Jeff Stroburg, CEO of Renewable Energy Group, discusses announcement of new program to ramp up biofuels job training and share Iowa's industry expertise.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, renewable energy group, jeff stroburg, biofuels training, green collar jobs

item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Bill Sanders US Department of Labor
item.itunes:summary: Bill Sanders, director of workforce innovations with US Department of Labor, talked about how the Bush administration has made training jobs for the energy sector a priority.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, biofuel, national biodiesel conference, 08-nbb, labor department, biofuels training, green collar jobs

item.itunes:summary: Joe Brehm talks about how Iowa Biofuels Training International pairs educational institutions and biofuels producers with potential green collar workers..

item.itunes:summary: Solazyme president Michael Wolfson talks about the potential for algae biodiesel.

item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman

item.title: NBB Podcast 1
item.itunes:author: Chuck Zimmerman
item.itunes:subtitle: Pre-conference Interview - Joe Jobe
item.itunes:summary: This is the first National Biodiesel Conference Podcast featuring an interview with NBB Executive Director Joe Jobe, who describes the history, agenda and reason why people attend.
item.itunes:keywords: biodiesel, fuel, renewable fuel, diesel, national biodiesel conference, travel, transportation
